fixes.name: Change Dv01 (USD) (Absolute)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau ABS([Change Dv01 (USD)]) to DAX ABS() and mapped the column reference to the table-specific format: 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Change Dv01 (USD)].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation depends on parameters through its dependent calculated fields (for example [Use Custom Date] and [End Date]), and per the rules any formula referencing parameters must be implemented as a measure.
